amendment.description: Amendment sought to direct a DOT rulemaking to require airlines to interline agreements and provide accommodations to passengers who are displaced due to events within an airline's control.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to direct a DOT rulemaking to require airlines to interline and provide accommodations to passengers who are displaced due to events within an airline's control.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 92 - 323 (Roll no. 158).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Lipinski.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 92 - 323 (Roll no. 158).
